Documentation.firstline: Types for the Parallel Block Basic Linear Algebra Sub-programs support WARNING: attributes marked with WARNING can not be changed without making corresponding changes to the C++ attributes
Documentation.content: Types for the Parallel Block Basic Linear Algebra Sub-programs support WARNING: attributes marked with WARNING can not be changed without making corresponding changes to the C++ attributes.

Definition.name: axpy

Documentation.content: Implements alpha*X + Y X and Y must have same shape

param.name: alpha
param.desc: Scalar multiplier for the X matrix

Definition.Signature: DATASET(Layout_Cell) axpy(value_t alpha, DATASET(Layout_Cell) X, DATASET(Layout_Cell) Y)

Documentation.content: Implements alpha*X + Y X and Y must have same shape
